statements: DELETE FROM player_profiles WHERE level > 50 AND experience < 1000;
DELETE FROM player_progress WHERE player_id = 1 AND level_completed > 10;
DELETE FROM player_progress WHERE player_id IN (SELECT player_id FROM player_profiles WHERE player_level < 5);
DELETE FROM player_progress WHERE player_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND progress_id = 1;
DELETE FROM progress_data WHERE player_id IN (SELECT player_id FROM player_profiles WHERE player_level < 10);
DELETE FROM inventory WHERE player_id NOT IN (SELECT player_id FROM achievements);
DELETE FROM player_profiles WHERE id = 1 AND username = 'player1';
DELETE FROM player_inventory WHERE player_id = 1 AND quantity = 0;
DELETE FROM player_achievements WHERE player_id = 2 AND date_achieved < '2021-01-01';
